class test_data_merge_move.TestMove¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the unit tests relating to the move function.

Methods

test_move()

Testing overall functionality.
test_move()¶

Testing overall functionality. Takes files from src_path and moves them to dst_path. The function then asserts whether the files exist in dst_path, subsequently removing the files after as part of teardown.
